name: Snek247 silly pixel platformer game
description:
snek247 game platformer very silly

v1.0.1
  • Epic new download page
  • Now can stand on the sides of spikes
  • Moving Platforms now reach you way quicker
  • Fixed 16:10 monitor UI errors
  • Now possible for a no-cherry run
***The game might be flagged as a virus by your antivirus but be assured it isn't :)
